Lord of Runestone0211852em7oe5e79006y71v3y35of5ns5facg1136752014-02-02T20:42:44ZGonzalo848331'''Lord of Runestone''' is the title held by the head of [[House Royce]], an ancient [[noble house]] of the [[Vale of Arryn]] seated at the castle of [[Runestone]].

The current Lord of Runestone is Lord [[Yohn Royce]].
